item.title: Post Undergraduate Update
item.description: As some may know, I recently graduated from college with a Bachelor’s of Science in Computer Science. I was a little worried about being able to find a job due to the craziness that was 2020. Luckily, the office I interned for during college was looking to hire a new full-time developer, and I fit right in! So over the past few months I have been learning about what it means to be a full-time developer and how much that differs from being just a student developer.
